text: Agent Message Events An information message from the agent, stated according to configurations done in an Event Notification configuration. For further information about the agent message Ready with file: name Reported along with the name of the target file when it has been successfully stored in the target directory. If an After Treatment Command is specified, the message also indicate that it has been executed. Debug Events There are no debug events for this agent.
title: ADLS2 File Forwarding Agent Events - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
